text: Manor House tube station is a station on the Piccadilly line of the London Underground, on the boundary between Travelcard Zone 2 and Zone 3. It straddles the border between the London Boroughs of Hackney and Haringey, the postal address and three of the entrances being in the former, and one entrance in the latter. ==References== Category:Piccadilly line stations Category:Transport in the London Borough of Hackney Category:Tube stations in the London Borough of Haringey Category:Railway stations opened in 1932 Category:Charles Holden buildings
title: Manor House tube station
